summary: About Nae-kyung who is able to assess the personality, mental state and habits of a person by looking at his face. Because of his abilities, he gets involved in a power struggle between Prince Sooyang and Kim Jong-Seo.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Jung-jae Lee|Yun-shik Baek|Jo Jung-Suk|Lee Jong-Suk|Hye-su Kim|Kwang-Hyun Joo|Eui-sung Kim|Kyoo-hyung Lee|Dong-Ryeok Sin
title: Gwansang
